::FireBlade::
FireBlade shoots a blast of fire at the incoming missiles and they
both explode in front of him sending him staggering back and tripping
over his own feet onto the ground. "Smooth..." he grumbles to himself
as he gets up and fire 15 shots of his PowerSurge rifle at Prowl as he
continues running for the wall of the CF..

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> All my Alliance bots are flying right now, so landing near them or
charging at them isn't very possible.
>
> If I miss any attacks (I'm kinda in a hurry), please inform me and
I'll post for them in my next post.
>
> ::Zardus/The Galactors/The Lavacons/Prowl/Kluster/Grimmler::
>
> Zardus angles upward, getting out of the way of any shots heading
for him. He recieves Dark One's transmission.
>
> "Kill them," he replies, "If they're firing at you, they're no
longer part of the Alliance."
>
> He sees Composer enter the battle, opening a comm to him as well.
"Open fire on anyone non-Maximal, prefferebly the ones with Decepticon
symbols. Use all you got."
>
> He looks down at the battle, aiming at Rampage and firing two
energy-draining missiles at the bot. The missile lock onto Rampage's
signature, following it.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Supernova spins in the air, two blasts passing right next to him. He
fires his gun at one of the incoming missiles, causing it to detonate
along with the other ones, but the shockwave nearly knocked him out of
the air. He flies up, avoiding Rampage.
>
> "Galactors, let's show them what we can do!" he yells to his fellow
teammates, "Form jets!"
>
> He transforms into a part of a jet, waiting for his team to do so as
well.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> One of the shots hit Slasys, nearly knocking him out of the air as
he recieves orders from Supernova. He clenches his teeth, transforming
into another part of a jet and joining with Supernova. He hoped that
Scrap would join with them so that they could use his repair system.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scrap transforms into part of a jet, joining with Supernova and
Slasys. The large jet takes off at full speed, passing Rampage and
firing two large signature-seeking missiles at Surgital.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Vicyr transforms into a part of a jet, combining with Flare and
cloaking them both. They fly at Surgital, firing two large charges,
set to explode on impact.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Astral recieves Zardus's orders, taking off and flying toward the
Cybertronian Fire. The other Lavacons follow him. He growls, looking
back and seeing that Fenox wasn't there. If they had to form Lavatron,
he would be missing an arm.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing his target stand up, Kluster fires two more missiles at
Rippersnapper.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Grimmler reaches the CF, flying into the air and pulling out a
missile launcher. He aims carefully, firing two missiles at Rampage,
hoping to knock him out of the air. The missiles were heat seeking.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> "Decepticons, it looks like," Prowl replies to Epyon as he fires two
more missiles at Fireblade. He glances back to see if Mantle and his
team were fighting yet (hint, hint, Jen).
>
>
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Hehe Cyberwolf, don't forget there is also a neautral bounty
hunter(Quatro) there.  And watch out, the Terrorcons can form Abominus
anytime!
> > ::Cutthroat/Triggerhappy/Bodicons/Composer/Quatro::
> >
> >     Cutthroat is suddenly blinded by smoke.  He waved it away, and
was enraged.
> >
> >     "Cutthroat slag Autobot trash buckets!!!!" Cutthroat yelled.
> >
> >     Cutthroat shot a big stream of flame from his mouth at the CF.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> >       Triggerhappy cackled, then fired a compressed air shot from
Blowpipe at the CF.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> >       The Bodicons saw this "Alliance" coming to help the Maximals.
> >
> >       "COMBINE!!!!!!!!" Decapitron yelled.
> >
> >       The other 4 Bodicons got close to Decapitron.  Then, their
bodies all got into the right positions and they formed a huge gestalt
warrior called Surgital.
> >
> >        "It's time for your operation!!!!" Surgital yelled down at
the Alliance members.
> >
> >        The Bodicons all agreed on a target.  Surgital's hand
converted into a massive spinning saw.  He lowered his hand down and
attempted to cut Megaton in half.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> >        Composer eventually arrived at the scene.  He landed beside
Zardus.
> >
> >        "My leader, I'm here to help you aid the Maximals.
Wheeljack is coming as well," Composer informed Zardus of his arrival.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> >       Quatro could hear the battle all around him.  Quatro went
outside and saw the gestalt warrior Surgital, and the Alliance coming
to help Maximals.
> >
> >       "The Maximals and their allies can fend off the Decepticons
by themselves.  I've got a feeling that this is a big trick.  I have
to see Megatron," Quatro said to himself.
> >
> >       Quatro ran around, trying to be stealthy so that nobody
could see him.  He didn't want to waste power on using his stealth
mode here.  Then, when he was away from the battle, he did a data
search on the Decepticons to try and find their base.
> >
> >        "Decepticon Base:Dark Avian," Quatro said aloud.
> >
> >        Quatro transformed to hoverbike mode, and speeded off
towards the Dark Avian.
